data.meta_site_name: James Noss Obituary | December 23, 2002 | Frank Kapr Funeral Home, Inc. - Scottdale, PA
data.text:
James L. Noss, 68 of Spring Street, Scottdale died unexpectedly, Monday, December 23, 2002 in Presbyterian, Pittsburgh. He was born January 11, 1934 in Scottdale a son of the late Frank L. Noss, Sr. and Ruth Hunker Noss. Prior to his retirement Jim was employed by the former Hackney Security Agency, Allied Mills, Duraloy Blaw-Knox Corp, Smodic's Flooring and Seaman Wholesale. He was a veteran of the Armed Forces serving with the US Marine Corp during the Korean Conflict. Jim leaves to cherish his memories, his loving and devoted wife of 45 years Kathryn J. Klanchesser Noss whom he married December 14, 1957. His Two Daughters: Sandy M. Tylka and her husband Bob of Scottdale Christine "Chris" Barckhoff and her husband Rodd of Knoxville, Tenn His Four Grandchildren: Allyson and Maria Tylka, John and Mary Barckhoff His Three Sisters: Mary Lou Sultzer and her husband Bill of Everson Ruth Ann Connors of California State Carole Fulton and her husband David of Altamonte Springs, Florida In addition to his parents, Jim was preceded in death by: His three Brothers Frank, Jack and Barry Noss Jim's family will greet friends in the Frank Kapr Funeral Home, Inc., 417 West Pittsburgh Street, Scottdale Thursday from 2 to 4 PM and 7 to 9 PM. A Blessing Service will be held Friday at 2 PM in the Funeral Home with the Rev. Leonard W. Stoviak, Pastor of St John The Baptist RC Church, Scottdale, Officiating. Committal service and interment will follow in Westmoreland Memorial Park, Greensburg.

To send flowers to the family or plant a tree in memory of James L. Noss, please visit our floral store.
